content: Home > Divisions > Personnel and Establishment Division > Cadre Administaration Section

title: Cadre Administration Section - Point 1
content: Reporting of vacancies in respect of all 5 Departments of Ministry of Finance, in CSS(upto SO)/CSCS/CSSS grades to DOPT.

title: Cadre Administration Section - Point 2
content: Appointment, ad-hoc promotion and regular promotion in CSS(upto SO)/CSCS/CSSS cadres.

title: Cadre Administration Section - Point 3
content: Convening DPCs for confirmation of Direct Recruitment ASO & Stenographers grade 'D'.

title: Cadre Administration Section - Point 4
content: Internal Departmental Transfer/posting of officers/officials of CSS(upto SO)/CSCS/CSSS cadres.

title: Cadre Administration Section - Point 5
content: Nomination of fresh ASO & Stenographers grade 'D' and SOs & PS who joins on the basis of Limited Departmental Competitive Exam in all five Departments of Ministry of Finance as and when provided by DOPT.

title: Cadre Administration Section - Point 6
content: Convening DPCs for promotion in respect of SOs, ASOs, PSs, PAs, SSAs, JSAs.

title: Cadre Administration Section - Point 7
content: UP-dation of vacancy position and maintenance of seniority lists in respect of (SO & Assistant SO) in CSS/CSSS/CSCS(JSA&SSA)/MTS of Ministry of Finance.

title: Cadre Administration Section - Point 8
content: Cadre Clearance in respect of CSS(upto SO)/CSCS/CSSS grades for ex-cadre posts & for taking VRS, Technical Resignation etc.

title: Cadre Administration Section - Point 9
content: En-cadrement of posts in respect of CSS(SO & ASO)/CSSS.

title: Cadre Administration Section - Point 10
content: To serve training notice in respect of CSS(SO & ASO)/CSCS(JSA &SSA)/CSSS on nomination by DOPT.

title: Cadre Administration Section - Point 11
content: RTI matters/VIP references/Parliament Question/Public Grievances/Court Cases relating to above subjects.

title: Cadre Administration Section - Point 12
content: Being the Nodal Section of Ministry of Finance, Co-ordination with DOPT in all aspects related with appointment, promotion, vacancy etc.

title: Cadre Administration Section - Point 13
content: Charge of Reference Library in Department of Expenditure.
